Tunesphere.tools: ReactJS, Spotify API, Jupyter Notebook, Tensorflow, CSS
Tunesphere.description: Song recommendation system that utilizes sentiment analysis to introduce new genres to listeners. Won Best Design at HackTJ 10.0.

Edge Detection.description: A program that detects edges in images using canny edge detection, hysteresis thresholding, and non-maximum suppression.

Knowledge Graph Generator.description: Project done as part of research conducted under GMU's ASSIP program on automated ontological knowledge formation.

Othello Bot.description: An AI bot that uses minimax algorithms to play othello. Uses techniques such as alphabeta pruning and heuristics.

Lyric Finder.description: A react app that finds the lyrics of songs using the Musixmatch API. Includes a top ten tracks leaderboard and ratings of songs.

Sentiment Classifier.tools: Jupyter Notebook, Pandas, Numpy, NLTK, SKLearn
Sentiment Classifier.description: A natural language processing model that finds the sentiment (good or bad) of restaurant reviews.

Portfolio.description: A portfolio website that showcases my projects and skills. Includes a contact form that sends emails to my inbox. You're looking at it right now :)
